items: Full-stack software engineer with over 15 years experience with the agile software development lifestyle. Deeply experienced with the Microsoft tech stack, as well as front-end frameworks like Angular. Committed to producing quality code and exercising industry best practices. Demonstrates excellence in collaboration, communication, and documentation.

items.title: Senior Full-stack Software Engineer
duties: Enhanced SaaS web applications facilitating Pay-As-You-Go functionality for worker's compensation insurance.
Implemented Single Sign-on with OpenID Connect and NgRx data storage within our Angular application.
Refactored our software offerings to meet modern best practices and design principals.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and participated in SCRUM ceremonies.
Participated in the entire software development lifecycle, including engineering approval and estimation, implementation, code reviews, CI/CD, documentation, release management

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
duties: Enhanced N-Tiered web applications utilizing technologies including ASP.NET, C#, Microsoft SQL Server, KendoUI, Angular, and SASS
Utilized pair programming within a remote development team
Participated in all Agile ceremonies: planning, estimation, demos, retrospectives
Spearheaded development of a mobile application created using Ionic Framework, Angular, Typescript, Cordova, and Gradle.
Configured software in AWS, utilizing CodeBuild, CodePipeline, CloudFront, and CloudFormation.

items.title: Application Developer
duties: I worked remotely as a member of a small team on both an on-premise Windows forms application, as well as a .Net web application serving the resource management industry.
I implemented enhancements as well as custom work requests in Windows forms, C# web services and code-behind, Microsoft SQL Server, ASP.Net, JQuery, and CSS.

items.title: Software Engineer
duties: As a member of a small team, I was responsible for the creation of a Silverlight web application designed to monitor unpowered assets for the rail industry.
I co-architected systems for message transfer, event brokerage, and data display.
I also developed an engine for auditing freight car maintence billing records.
I used tools such as C#, Silverlight with MVVM, Microsoft SQL Server, Entity Framework, and WPI.

items.title: Software Developer
duties: I created, maintained, and enhanced ASP.Net web applications for the nuclear industry, focusing on equipment reliability and access authorization.
I used C# in ASP.Net, Microsoft SQL Server, and Oracle databases.
